event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: The component that is at fault is difficult to determine. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A fatal protocol error detected by a XB chip.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
A fatal protocol error detected by a XB chip.

The exact cause of this fault is very difficult to isolate and the faulty component is not truly known.

The entire platform is reset, but nothing is deconfigured.


The recommended service action for this event is outlined in the steps below.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 27 15:31:07 nwk-dc2-1-sc0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: nwk-dc2-1  
   EVENT-ID: d9e7e466-c32f-4657-8257-404dcf68e64f
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-E5 for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8006-E5, TYPE: Upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 15:31:07 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: nwk-dc2-1, HOSTNAME: nwk-dc2-1-sc0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: d9e7e466-c32f-4657-8257-404dcf68e64f
   DESC: A fatal protocol error detected by a XB chip.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-E5 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured.
   IMPACT: The entire platform is reset.
   REC-ACTION: The component that is at fault is difficult to determine.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command
   

   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u d9e7e466-c32f-4657-8257-404dcf68e64f

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 27 15:31:07.1383 d9e7e466-c32f-4657-8257-404dcf68e64f SCF-8006-E5
           100%  upset.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.if.fe-xb

                 Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=0/xb=0
                    Affects: -
                        FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=nwk-dc2-1:
                             server-id=nwk-dc2-1-sc0:serial=PP0639L444:
                             part=CA06620-D301 A6:revision=0201/component=/XBU_B#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.


If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response

event_registry_properties.item: A fatal protocol error detected by a XB chip.
